      • recvString

        public java.lang.String recvString(boolean blocking)
                            throws IOException
        Helper method for receive message from socket as string with option for set blocking flag. This method uses utf-8 encoding for converts a bytes array to string.
        Parameters:
        blocking - set blocking or non blocking flag.
        Returns:
        receved data as unicode string.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • recvString

        public java.lang.String recvString()
                            throws IOException
        Helper method for receive message from socket as string in a blocking mode. This method uses utf-8 encoding for converts a bytes array to string.
        Returns:
        receved data as unicode string.
        Throws:
        IOException
